text:
e-bot7 | Data Scientist | Munich, Germany | Full-time | Onsite

e-bot7 is a Munich-based startup that redefines customer service through the integration of artificial intelligence. Our mission is to automate repetitive queries, leaving human agents with more interesting work while collecting data to train increasingly powerful neural networks. Today, we work with large and progressive corporations throughout Europe.

ï»¿We are looking for Data Scientists experienced in the fields of NLP/NLU and conversational AI. As a member of our team you will have a significant impact on the technical direction of the company. If you are looking for challenges and enjoy working and experimenting with new technologies, we would be happy to meet you!

Apply for openings here: https://ebot7.heavenhr.com/jobs

Or email us directly at careers@e-bot7.com
